channel.title: Relay on Fonzi Vazquez
channel.description: Recent content in Relay on Fonzi Vazquez

item.description: After years of performing lead/architect-level QA work without concern for titles, but rather for the sake of learning, I started Bison Software. The surprise wasn’t the technical work; it was the taxes. There were forms to fill out with a due date of 30 days before penalties and fees ensued. The true bugs were in the paperwork. All good software has some bs. I guess all good systems have some bs as well…
Map Testing? How do you do it? Got a blog coming soon.
Today felt like I was QA, PM, PO, and janitorâ€”cleaning up a mess I didnâ€™t make, with 7 hours to launch. And getting a non stable testing environment.
I almost added a like button. Then I remembered my email is at the bottom.
Debugged the upload, verified S3, wrote the curl â€” then got asked for my request body.
I needed a place for stray thoughts, technical friction, and half-built ideas. But not a social media.ðŸ’€
